Trevor Hoffman 's request was turned down, making it difficult to rekindle contract talks." i would say because of the way it was handled, it appears as though he is done as a padre, said rick thurman, Trevor Hoffman 's agent. Trevor Hoffman , 41, has played all but 28 of his 755 major-league games in a padres uniform. san diego acquired him from the florida marlins, with José Martínez and Andrés Berumen , for Gary Sheffield and rich rodriquez on june 24, 1993. Trevor Hoffman is 49-53 lifetime with a 2.76 earned-run average and a major-league record 554 saves?? all but two of them with the padres. the right-hander has struck out 1,055 batters and walked just 274 in 988 innings in 930 relief appearances over 16 mlb seasons.
